isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE

svcprocinfo.para: There are two reasons for removing the inner cab door handle, the first is to replace a broken inner cab door handle with a new one. The second is to remove the inner cab door handle with the modular door hardware assembly removed and laying on a suitable work surface, to service the modular door hardware assembly or replace the modular door hardware assembly.
If replacing cab door inner cab door handle, use the procedure below, Remove Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle to replace Inner Cab Door Handle on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.
If removing cab door inner cab door handle to service the modular door hardware assembly, use the procedure below, Remove Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle to replace Inner Cab Door Handle on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

step1.para: If vehicle is equipped with electric door window, raise cab door glass all the way to the top of the window opening before disconnecting electric window switch panel during cab door trim panel removal.
If vehicle is equipped with manual door window, raise cab door glass all the way to the top of the window opening before removing window regulator handle during cab door trim panel removal.

Remove cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 52
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Remove torx head bolt (Item 1) from inner cab door handle (Item 2), driver side shown.

Slide inner cab door handle (Item 2) to the right enough to pull both retaining tabs (Item 3) out of modular door hardware assembly (Item 4). Lift inner cab door handle up and over window regulator assembly and rotate it counterclockwise until S hook of inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2, Figure 61)
is in line with lower control rod mounting slot of inner cab door handle, as viewed from backside of modular door hardware assembly.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 61
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide inner cab door handle to the right until the S hook of inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) is pulled through lower control rod mounting slot of inner cab door handle.

Once the S hook of inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) is pulled through lower control rod mounting slot of inner cab door handle. Rotate upper control rod mounting hole of inner cab door handle off S hook of inner cab door handle control rod (Item 5). Discard broken inner cab door handle.

figure.caption: Figure 61. Inner Cab Door Handle and Control Rods

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD
5. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove a broken passenger side cab door inner cab door handle.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

step1.para:
Remove cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
. If cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to
MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For removing cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Remove Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

With cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 46)
removed and placed on a suitable work surface. Remove cab door outer cab door handle and cab door latch as follows.

Remove cab door outer cab door handle, refer to
OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE
. For removing cab door outer cab door handle, refer to Remove Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

Remove cab door latch, refer to
CAB DOOR LATCH
. For removing cab door latch, refer to Remove Cab Door Latch on Daycab and Sleeper Cab.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) laying on it's front, remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) with spring (Item 3) from retaining clip (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 52
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: With modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) laying on it's back, remove torx head bolt (Item 1) from inner cab door handle (Item 2), driver side shown.

Slide inner cab door handle (Item 2) to the right enough to pull both retaining tabs (Item 3) out of modular door hardware assembly (Item 4). Lift inner cab door handle up and over window regulator assembly and slide it to the right until inner cab door handle control rods (Items 2 and 5, Figure 61)
clear opening in modular door hardware assembly, driver side shown. Lay inner cab door handle with inner cab door handle control rods out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once inner cab door handle (Item 1) is removed from modular door hardware assembly, remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) from inner cab door handle, then remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 3) with spring (Item 4) from slotted hole of inner cab door handle, driver side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 62. Inner Cab Door Handle and Control Rods

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD
3. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side cab door inner cab door handle.
